hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Burdah said:“I entered upon ‘Aishah and she brought out to me a thick waist wrap of the type made in Yemen, and one of these cloaks that are called Mulabbadah,* and she swore to me that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) had passed away in them.”

chapter.ara-name: باب لِبَاسِ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ
chapter.eng-name: The clothing of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ)
